name: Tipsy
description:
Oh no! You knew your hard drinking was going to get you in trouble one day and now look, you've somehow broken into a china shop! How did you get there? No time to worry about that, just get out as soon as you can and try not to break anything, you really can't afford that. 

 Use WASD or arrow keys to move your character around and try to get to the open door to freedom. You want to avoid breaking the fragile china, even a little push could cause chaos. Your character will occasionally stumble as you walk so try to give yourself some room as you pass the tables. Too many broken plates and you'll be a sad drunk. 

 The game has multiple levels and the levels have randomly spawning tables but there's always a clear path to the exit if you're careful. Good luck. 

 This game was made in Unity with all 3d assets modeled in Blender.

Controls WASD or arrow keys to move

Sliders for audio available.
